dataCollection.id: Data dikumpulkan dari sumber resmi pemerintah pusat dan daerah melalui publikasi APBN/APBD, laporan realisasi anggaran, dan portal data terbuka pemerintah.
dataCollection.en: Data collected from official central and regional government sources through APBN/APBD publications, budget realization reports, and government open data portals.

processing.id: Data diproses dan dinormalisasi untuk konsistensi format, kemudian divalidasi terhadap sumber primer dan publikasi resmi.
processing.en: Data is processed and normalized for format consistency, then validated against primary sources and official publications.

validation.id: Validasi dilakukan melalui cross-reference dengan multiple sumber, verifikasi total anggaran, dan konsistensi temporal data.
validation.en: Validation performed through cross-reference with multiple sources, budget total verification, and temporal data consistency.

id: Data APBD tidak semua tersedia real-time, tergantung publikasi masing-masing daerah
Beberapa komponen anggaran mungkin menggunakan kategorisasi yang berbeda antar daerah
Data realisasi anggaran memiliki lag time 1-3 bulan dari periode pelaporan
en: APBD data is not all available in real-time, depending on each region's publication schedule
Some budget components may use different categorization across regions
Budget realization data has a 1-3 month lag time from the reporting period

methodology.updateFrequency: Monthly for realization data, Quarterly for revised budgets, Annually for new budget allocations
